0.title: Dafi make-up remover thin wipes 5x1
0.description:
Special for all skin types

Dafi's thin makeup remover wipes have the ability to deeply and completely remove any facial makeup, even waterproof makeup.

  • Complete removal of fat and pollution from the skin
  • Hydrating and maintaining skin moisture
  • Antibacterial and antiallergenic
  • Contains extracts of cucumber, lemon, aloe vera, chamomile and marigold to maintain the clarity and softness of the skin.
  • Free of alcohol, paraben and soap
  • Quantity: 70 sheets

1.title: Extra thin make-up remover wipes
1.description:
Extra thin make-up remover wipes are a high-quality and affordable product for removing face make-up.

  • Removing all types of fat and pollution from the skin
  • Contains aloe vera, chamomile, marigold, cucumber and lemon extracts to hydrate and maintain the softness, clarity and freshness of the facial skin.
  • Free of alcohol, paraben and soap
  • Quantity: 50 sheets
